summary: Defines the ItemReader component used by the Map state executor to fetch and process individual items from a data source. It integrates configuration, resource evaluation, and output transformation to produce a textual representation of each item for further evaluation within a Step Functions workflow.
business_intent: Facilitate the execution of AWS Step Functions Map states by providing a reusable mechanism to read, evaluate, and transform each element of an input collection, enabling scalable parallel processing of tasks.
